sentences.sentence: What could make it fizzle out this time?
sentences.translation: 那么这次又有什么可能导致失败呢？

sentences.sentence: Did your ebook fizzle out after a few pages?
sentences.translation: 你的电子书是不是一些页数之后终归失败？

sentences.sentence: Or will the idea disappointingly fizzle once again?
sentences.translation: 还是又一次以失望告终？
